scripts.dev: pnpm --filter agent-api dev & pnpm --filter agent-web dev
scripts.build: pnpm --filter agent-api build && pnpm --filter agent-web build
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter agent-api typecheck && pnpm --filter agent-web typecheck
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter agent-api lint && pnpm --filter agent-web lint
